146
WAIVER OF A HEREDITARY PORTION PRIOR TO DIVISION
(1) Prior to division, an heir may transfer his or her hereditary portion, either in total or in part, only to another heir.
(2) A contract on the transfer of a hereditary portion must be certified.
(3) A contract on the transfer of a hereditary portion between an heir and a person who is not an heir is binding on the heir only in so far as to pass his or her share to the other contractual party after the division; the other party shall have no other right before the division.
(4) An agreement among heirs that they shall become co-owners of the individual items of property in the estate in proportion to their hereditary portion shall also count as division.
